rules.active: Become the legal owner of a building of your choice. Existing tenants will be evicted immediately.

details.flavour: Property is not the natural, obvious, and inevitable concept that most people think it is.

rules.active: Name an NPC. They will be suddenly inspired to seek greatness. By next session they will be incredibly powerful.

details.flavour: There was a light within us that few can see. One day it will shine through.

rules.active: Name a character not on the current map. They die instantly.

details.flavour: I wish this guy would just die before we even showed up, that'd save us a lot of time.
